tag_list: search, solr, elasticsearch, cloud-computing, oracle, dell, faceted-search, as-a-service
overview: Mark Brandon is the co-founder and CEO of StackSearch, Inc., a search-as-a-service startup based in Fayetteville, AR. With two decades of technology sales, he previously founded First Sustainable, a web-based investment advisory, and Daylight Online Brokerage, an online trading and clearing firm that was successfully exited in 2000. His big-company experience includes stints with Oracle Corp, where he sold the Middleware solution stack to Fortune 100 clients, and Dell Inc., where he sold the entire technology portfolio to top-tier Higher Education and K12 institutions.
